original_text: So we do not lose heart. Though our outer self is wasting away, our inner self is being renewed day by day.
korean_text: 그러므로 우리가 낙심하지 아니하노니 우리의 겉사람은 낡아지나 우리의 속사람은 날로 새로워지도다

sentences.original_text: So we do not lose heart.
Though our outer self is wasting away,
our inner self is being renewed day by day.
